page.title: 10LOCAL POLICEMAN
page.content: We live in the area served by the Northern Constabulary. The local policeman usually works eight hours a day but if he is required to work more than eight hours he does.His beat or area is Smithton, Balloch,Culloden, Cradlehall and Westhill. The policemans job increases in the Summer because of the increase in population due to tourism. Our local policeman patrols in a car and has a portacabin next to his house where he does his paperwork and where he keeps stolen or lost property. We can't contact our local policeman on the phone by the number 999 but we could get a policeman in the Inverness Police Station.There are two council houses kept seperate from the rest for two policemen's families to live there until they move onto another town.
